mean_cn: v.收拾，打包；把......包起来；塞满，挤满；  n.行李；背包；小盒，小包；群
mean_en: to put clothes, etc. into a bag in preparation for a trip away from home; to put something into a container so that it can be stored, transported or sold
sentence: The boy is packing his clothes for the trip.
sentence_trans: 曼尼在打包旅行需要的衣物。
